sent_text: Cancer ? Paranoia ? Eagerness to finally get to his peaceable kingdom ? Nobody is really sure .
Nobody is absolutely sure what will finally emerge .

As Robert Marich , business editor of The Hollywood Reporter trade newspaper , put it  -COL-   -LBQ-  Everybody is scratching their heads , but nobody is really surprised that Diller was going to make a move -- it was just a question of where or when .
